hero_body: GyanShala is a low-bandwidth, AI-powered education companion built for government schools, NGOs, and community classrooms. It helps teachers deliver structured lessons, revision, and career guidance even when internet access is patchy.
feature_low_connectivity_body: Lessons are optimized to work smoothly on 2G/3G networks, with offline-friendly content and lightweight media so learners never miss a class. Downloadable modules and bite-sized videos keep data usage low while still feeling rich and interactive.
feature_multilang_body: Switch between regional languages so students can learn in the language they understand best, including local scripts and examples rooted in everyday rural life.
feature_ai_body: AI-assisted summaries, practice questions, and step-by-step explanations that adjust to each learner's pace, helping students revise smarter and teachers save time.
supported_languages_list: English, Hindi, Bengali, Tamil, Telugu, Marathi
how_it_helps_body: GyanShala brings together curriculum-aligned lessons, practice sets, and guidance content so that teachers, volunteers, and parents can run effective study circles in villages and small towns.
how_it_helps_point_teachers: Teachers get ready-to-use lesson flows and homework suggestions.
how_it_helps_point_students: Students get revision, quizzes, and concept explanations in their own language.
how_it_helps_point_community: Communities can track engagement and support learners who are at risk of dropping out.
made_for_rural_schools_body: Support teachers with structured digital content that fits into regular classroom routines without needing computer labs or expensive devices.
made_for_ngos_body: Run after-school programs, bridge courses, and foundational literacy and numeracy camps with ready-made modules.
made_for_parents_body: Use simple, guided practice sessions to keep children learning at home, even when schools are far away or timing is irregular.
footer_note_line1: Designed for schools, NGOs & community centres.
footer_note_line2: Bring GyanShala to your village and keep every learner connected to quality learning, guidance, and opportunities.
auth_subtitle: Use a simple account to save your progress across lessons, even on low connectivity.
